name: intro
text: We take a few variables into account before we can set any price on your order.

name: input
text: First off is your input. As a customer, you're allowed a crectain freedom in the way you make your order. Ranging from a simple, but understandable, description of what you want to a complete mockup. Or even a working application you want us to tweak or fix. Just know that we do not support any kind of plagiarism or copycatting. You can choose a few designs or features from an app but not enough to qualify as plagiarism.

name: volume
text: Second is the volume of your app.

name: complexity
text: Third and last is the complexity. Depending on its complexity, the price could drastically change.

name: final
text: We approximate the price of the final product taking all that into consideration. But it all boils down to this; how long will it take us to do it. And how much work will we put into it.
